intro: Lindleyella, commonly known as the false hellebore, is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Melanthiaceae. It consists of several species, primarily found in the eastern and central regions of North America. The plants are herbaceous perennials with basal leaves that are often deeply lobed or divided. Lindleyella species are often found in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and along stream banks.
